explanation: Several participants referenced significant buying activity and ETF competition for BTC, suggesting institutional demand and upward momentum. There was also mention of a buy call algorithm with a high target (TP 108.4k), and no strong opposing views. However, some comments alluded to uncertainty and questions about a potential short, lowering overall confidence.
